page.title: 14Wedgwood Monument near Talke
page.content: Wedgwood's Monument is a prominent land mark,and stands on the summit of bignall hill.The stucture itself measures about twenty feet high .When it was first built it measured 90 feet high,before it was blown down in January 1979.John Wedgwood died on the 6th of February 1839,aged 79 years old.People say that he is buried inside it.Before he died,he left this will."I desire my body to be interred with my estate at Bignall End in a vaulted tombe at the summit of a certain field called Old Hill....and my executors do cause an obelisk or monument to be or erected." On the east side of the monument there is a plaque which reads:John Wedgwood of Bignall End Esquire,Born February 1760,Died February 6th A.D.1839.
